name: Qingming Huang
content: 黄庆明-中国科学院大学-UCAS [中文] [English] Education Experience Publications Research Interests Collaboration General Qingming HuangChair Professor, IEEE FellowSchool of Computer Science and TechnologyUniversity of Chinese Academy of SciencesNo. 19A Yuquan Road, Shijingshan DistrictBeijing 100019, ChinaTel/Fax: +86-10-62600548Email: qmhuang@ucas.ac.cn Research Areas Multimedia Computing, Image/Video Processing, Pattern Recognition, Computer Vision Education 09/1984-07/1988, Harbin Institute of Technology, Computer Science, B.S. 09/1988-08/1994, Harbin Institute of Technology, Computer Engineering, Ph.D. Experience Work Experience 08/1994-05/1995, Harbin Institute of Technology, Lecturer 05/1995-11/1996, National University of Singapore, Postdoctoral Fellow 11/1996-05/2002, Institute for Infocomm Research, Singapore, Member Research Staff 06/2002-05/2003, Vislog Technology Pte Ltd, Singapore, Principal Engineer 05/2003-present, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, Professor Teaching Experience Pattern RocognitionPattern Rocognition and Machine Learning Pattern Recognition in Image and Video AnalysisVisual Information Learning and Analysis Publications Papers Published more than 400 academic papers in prestigued international journals such as IEEE Trans. on Image Processing, IEEE Trans. on Multimedia, IEEE Trans. on CSVT, and top level international conferences including ACM Multimedia, ICCV, CVPR, ECCV, etc.[1] Xu, Qianqian, Xiong, Jiechao, Cao, Xiaochun, Huang, Qingming, Yao, Yuan.
